title: Bug 49299: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 inconsistency regarding custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299: The Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 specification wrongly states that the custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: The current implementation in the trunk does not follow the specification. Despite setting a custom cookie name, the default 'jsessionid' is still used for URL rewriting.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a custom cookie name is set, it should be used for URL rewriting instead of the default 'jsessionid'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce the issue: 
1. Deploy the attached 'cookiename.war' file
2. Access the application using the URL: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/
